name: Bestow
summary: The user gives their held item to the target. Multitype Pokémon can't Bestow a plate, Giratina can't Bestow its Griseous Orb, and Genesect can't Bestow a Drive. This move fails if the target already has a held item.
viability: Under no circumstances should this move ever be run. Especially when Trick and Switcheroo exist, there's no point in just giving a Pokémon an item. Besides, most Pokémon already hold items in the first place, rendering Bestow completely pointless.
